あら……皆さんお揃いで。一体なんのご用でしょうか？: Oh... Everyone's here. What can I do for you?
ラミしらなーい。ついて来いって言われただけだもん。\nあ！ もしかして、がんばっ:
I don't know about lamii. I was just told to follow you.
Oh! Could it be that she canceled school because she worked so hard?!
訓練だけで結果も出ていないのに、そんなはずがあるわけないでしょう？: There's no way that's possible when you're only training and you haven't gotten any results, right?
ちえー。わかってるつーの。冗談通じないヤツ！: Tch. I know. He can't take a joke!
まさか……%usernameusernameuserna%さん、例の件でいらした: Don't tell me... %usernameusernameuserna%-san, are you here about that?
ああ、もう待ちきれなくってな。ウズウズしてたところなんだ。\nもうあるんだろ？:
Yeah, I couldn't wait any longer. I was just getting itchy.
It's already there, isn't it? In the student council hangar.
そんなに急がずとも、約束の物は明日には柊校舎の格納庫まで\n輸送する予定ですのに:
There's no need to rush. The promised items will be in the Hiiragi school hangar tomorrow.
We're supposed to transport it.
いいよ、もう動かせるんだろう？\n運ぶのはこっちでやるさ。:
It's okay. You can move now, right?
I'll take care of the transport.
手続きは全て完了しているので構いませんが。\n……では、こちらで引き渡しを。:
All the paperwork is done, so I don't mind.
...Then, I'll hand it over.
約束のもの……？\nそれに格納庫ということは、もしや……:
The one you promised...?
And if it's the hangar, then maybe...
そうだ。俺が搭乗するＭＧだよ。: That's right. It's the MG I'm boarding.
あー、それで目ぇキラキラさせてたんだー。\nオモチャに喜ぶコドモみたーい♪:
Ah, so that's why your eyes were sparkling.
I want to be like a kid who's happy to be a toy♪
うっせうっせ。お前のようなオコチャマには、このロマンがわからんか！: Shut up, shut up. Can't a guy like you understand this romance?!
だーれがオコチャマだよ！！: Who are you calling a freak?!
……あれ、クソガキからはちょっとマシになった？: ...Huh? Is it a little better than that shitty brat?
そこで溜飲下がる……！？: That's where you're going to drink it all...!?
きっと、私達にも機体特性を知っていてほしかったんですよ！: I'm sure he wanted us to know about the aircraft's properties, too!
えー？ 自分の機体を自慢したいだけじゃないのー？: Huh? Don't you just want to brag about your own aircraft?
なあ、まだか？\n早く見せてくれ！:
Hey, not yet?
Hurry up and show me!
こんなにテンションの高い%usernameusernameuserna%さん、\:
%usernameusernameuserna%-san, with such high spirits,
This might be the first time I've seen it...
あの軍曹みたいな時とは、また別ものだね……: It's completely different from that sergeant-like time...
そう慌てなくとも、ちゃんとありますよ。ほら、あちらに。: There's no need to rush. It's right there. Look, over there.
なんか、カッコイーんだけど！\nズルだ！ ズルい～！:
It's kind of cool!
No fair! No fair~!
文字通り、知らない機体ね……こんなのいつの間に……？: Literally, I don't know this machine... When did this happen...?
もしかして、新型ですか！\nさすが%usernameusernameuserna:
Could it be a new model?!
That's %usernameusernameuserna%-san for you!
こちらは試作メイズガーダー統制機その名を……: This is the Prototype MaysGuarder Control Machine. Its name is...
この機体は、今後行われるであろう大深度地下の探索に向けて\n開発されました。:
This machine is preparing for the future exploration of the deep underground.
It's been developed.
機体の特性は指揮統制……メイズ深域で仲間を\n指揮し続けることを主眼に設計されて:
The characteristics of the aircraft are command and control... In the Mays Deep Levels, we have comrades.
It's designed to continue commanding.
なので、単独の戦闘能力よりも、\n索敵・通信・機動性能に特化した機体です。:
As such, it was more important than a single combat ability
It specializes in Enemy Search, Communication, and Mobility.
その試験運用を%usernameusernameuserna%さんに任せます。: I'll leave that trial operation to %usernameusernameuserna%-san.
すごい……この機体のデータによって、\n今後の深度地域の探索の未来も左右されるん:
Amazing... Thanks to this machine's data,
The future of our exploration of the deeper regions will be affected as well, right?
重要な役目ですわ。\nそんな任を与えられるとは、素直に感心しますわね……:
It's an important role.
I'm honestly impressed that you're given such a task...
ちょ、ちょっと待ったー！！\nコイツに、指揮専用機なんて渡していいの！？:
W-Wait a minute!!
Is it really okay for me to give her a command-only aircraft?!
あなた方も、彼の指揮による能力向上の恩恵があったはずです。\nそれを更に円滑に行:
You, too, must have benefited from improving your abilities under his command.
You'll be able to do it more smoothly.
クックック……これで、こいつらを全員俺の手駒に……！: Heh heh... Now they’re all my pawns...!
……人選ミスだったかもしれませんね。: ...I may have chosen the wrong person.
うそうそうそ！\nワタシは、ナカマを、タイセツにしマス。:
No way, no way!
I'm going to make a timer out of a sea cucumber.
すっごい棒読みだね。: That's one hell of a monotone.
冗談はさておき……生徒会長！ これは、乗ってみても構わないか！？: Joking aside... Student Council President! Do you mind if I ride this?!
ええ、どうぞ。最初は着座調整が必要ですよ。: Yes, go ahead. You'll need to adjust your seat first.
俺は心のなかでガッツポーズした。\nついに、俺の機体が動かせる！！:
I pumped my fist in my heart.
Finally, my machine can move!!
けどさー、キミってＭＧの操縦できるんだっけ？\n記憶もないのに、一人で大丈夫ー？:
But you know, you can pilot MGs, right?
Even though you don't have any memories, are you okay on your own?
ふふ、こんなこともあろうかと、\n夜な夜な教範を熟読していたんだ……:
Hehe, I thought something like this might happen,
I've been reading the instructor night after night...
と言いたいところだが、やはり初めての経験だ。\n誰かに補助を頼んだ方がいいかもし:
Or so I'd like to say, but this is still my first time experiencing it.
It might be better to ask someone for help.
誰に頼もうか……: I don't know who to ask...
私が、補助を……？わかりました、がんばりますねっ！: I'll help...? Understood, I'm going to do my best!
以前なら物怖じしていただろう提案も、\n訓練で少し積極的になっためるは、快く引き:
Even the proposal that would have scared me before...
Meguru, who had become a little more assertive during training, gladly accepted.
俺はコックピットに乗り込み、めるに手伝ってもらいながら、\n初期起動時の設定を進:
I climbed into the cockpit and got Meguru's help.
I proceed with setting up the initial activation.
調整、これで大丈夫だと思います: Adjustment, I think this will do.
ありがとう。軽く歩かせてみるから、外で見ていてくれ。: Thank you. I'll let you walk for a bit, so watch from outside.
いいですわよ。わたくしも新型機について、知っておきたいですから。: It's fine. I want to know more about the new model, too.
任せろと言わんばかりに胸を張る七彩。\nうん、ドヤ顔が似合うな。:
Shichika puffed out his chest as if to say, Leave it to me.
Yeah, a smug look would suit her.
俺はコックピットに乗り込み、七彩に手伝ってもらいながら、\n初期起動時の設定を進:
I climbed into the cockpit and asked Shichika for help
I proceed with setting up the initial activation.
なんかさ、アイツ……何かを頼むときって\n絶対にあのふたりのどっちかじゃない？:
It's like, when he asks for something...

こらこら、野暮なことを言っちゃだめだよ。\n人の恋路は見守らなくっちゃ。:
Hey, hey, don't be so rude.

これが……ラブコメの波動。: This is... the wave of romcoms.
（……一応音拾ってるから、聞こえてるんだが）: (...I'm picking up the sound, so I can hear you.)
（お前ら３人、俺に何をしようとしてたのか、\n忘れたわけじゃあるまいな……）:
(What the three of you were trying to do to me,
I hope you haven't forgotten...)
軽く深呼吸して、コクピットの空気で肺を満たす。: I take a deep breath and fill my lungs with the air in the cockpit.
初めてなのに、座り慣れたような……不思議な感覚だった。\nこいつを動かすために必:
It was my first time, but I felt like I was used to sitting... It was a strange sensation.
What I need to do to move this thing naturally comes to mind.
記憶を失う前、俺はＭＧに乗っていたのかもしれない。\n依然として俺が何者なのか、:
I might have been riding MG before I lost my memories.
There are still a lot of mysteries as to who I am, but...
だからこそ、答えを知るために……\n俺にはこいつが必要だ。:
That's why, in order to know the answer...
I need this.
準備はいいな？ 相棒。さあ、目覚めてもらうぞ──。: Are you ready, partner? Come on, wake up.
すごいっ……！\nこんなにしっかり、歩けるなんて……！:
Amazing...!
I can't believe I can walk so well...!
つか、アイツ、シミュレーターも観戦モードばっかなのに！\n一体いつの間に、操縦な:
Heck, even though the simulators are all in spectator mode!
When did you learn how to fly?!
自分のプライベート時間を削って学習したのでしょう。\n彼の部屋は遅くまで明かりが:
You must have learned by whittling down your own private time.
His room is lit late.
ちぇー……いつの間にか、他のチームに交渉して、\nラミたちのシミュレーター割当も:
Tch... Before I knew it, I’d negotiated with the other teams
I'll get the simulator assignments for Rami and the others, too...
ふざけたヤツなのに、努力もしてるとか……なんか、悔し～っ！！: He's just messing around, but he's also working hard... It's kinda frustrating!!
……彼は最初からずっと、本気で取り組んでいた。: ...He had been working seriously from the very beginning.
まあ、ね。厳しいけど、効果はあった。\nついていく価値はありそうだよね。:
Well, yeah. It was harsh, but it worked.
I think it's worth tagging along.
わ、わたくしは初めから、あの方の才能に気づいていましたわ！: I-I've been aware of his talent from the start!
えへへ……でも、私がイジメられてるんじゃないかって、\n怒ってくれたのも七彩さん:
Ehehe... But I thought she was bullying me,
You're the one who got angry, aren't you?
あ、あれは……！ わたくしがついていながら、\nチームメイトに不和が出るなど許せ:
Th-That's...! While I was with her,
I just can't allow discord to break out between my teammates!
ふふっ。ありがとうございます！\nだけど心配ありませんよ！:
Hehe. Thank you very much!
But there's no need to worry!
%usernameusernameuserna%さんについていけば、\nきっとカ:
If I follow %usernameusernameuserna%-san,
I'm sure I can even beat Chaos Maiden!
眼下で和気藹々と話しているシリウスシュガーの面々に、\n俺はスピーカーのスイッチ:
The members of Sirius Sugaru were talking in harmony below
I turned on the speaker and called out to her.
待たせたな。チェックは十分だ。みんな、柊校舎に戻るぞ。: Sorry to keep you waiting. We've checked enough. Everyone, let's head back to the Hiiragi building.
ああ、そうだ。いよいよ次は……: Yeah, that's right. Next up is...
改めて５人揃ってのチームワークの訓練――: Once again, the five of us were training in teamwork—
いきなりですのっ！？\n指揮官機を入れての訓練も無しに、実戦なんて……:
It's so sudden!?

やだやだ！ やっとＭＧが来たんだぞ！\nメイズ行きたい！ 行きたーい！！:
No, no! MG’s finally here!
Maze, I wanna go! I  want to go!!
うん、本当についていっていいのか、ちょっと心配になってきたね……: Yeah, I'm starting to worry if it's really okay for me to follow you...
行ってくんないならもう指導しないっ！！: If you're not going to go, I won't instruct you anymore!!
汚いぞー！！\nラミたちを人質にするなー！！:
It's dirty!!

……仕方ない。面白いから付き合おう。: ...It can't be helped. It's interesting, so let's go out.
あははっ。%usernameusernameuserna%さん、\n可愛いところ:
Ahaha. %usernameusernameuserna%-san,

ああ、そういえば──%usernameusernameuserna%さん。\nひ:
Oh yeah, come to think of it~%usernameusernameuserna%-san.

I followed the hazy light from her
